title: Tour de France unsung heroes: Jonas Abrahamsen on gaining almost 20 kilos to go faster
content:
The Uno-X rider is making his Tour de France debut after a tumultuous season that has been disrupted by illness and a high-speed crash.

Read the full article at Tour de France unsung heroes: Jonas Abrahamsen on gaining almost 20 kilos to go faster on Velo.
author: sadhbhoshea
